property.name: conf_file
property.description: Config File Template to be used with for mongodb config instances

property.name: cluster_definition
property.description: This property is used to set up the mongodb config server replicaset instances. It also can be used to set up more than one instance in the same server. For example, the value: "node1,node2,node2" will set up a a replica set with two instances in the node2. You can't define arbiters here! There is not possible to a mongodb config instance to work as an arbiter. You can't define more the one replicaset (more than one shard) for mongodb config instances. If this value is empty, a replicaset will be created with one instance for each mongoconf server in ambari mongodb service install.
property.display-name: Define the mongodb config server replicaset architecture

property.name: ports
property.description: This port list is separated by commas. You can use a sequence of ports like: 27017-27020. Or complex setting like: 27017,27019,27025-27027. The resulting list of the example will be folling ports: 27017,27019,27025,27026,27027
property.display-name: Avaliable ports for mongod instances on each server

property.name: shard_prefix
property.description: The prefix that will be used to name mongodb config replicaset.
